item.Q:
Write the character:
1: to hold; to contain; to grasp; to take hold of; a handle; (classifier for objects with a handle); (particle marking the following noun as a direct object)
2: handle
item.A:
1: bǎ 2: bà
把握 bǎwò grasp; seize; hold; assurance; certainty 把子 bàzǐ handle

item.Q:
Write the character:
by (indicates passive-voice sentences or clauses); to cover; to wear
item.A:
bèi
被迫 bèipò be compelled; be forced

item.Q:
Write the character:
just; honorable (designation); public; common
item.A:
gōng
公司 gōngsī (business) company; company; firm; corporation; incorporated

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: by the; per; discuss; theory; to talk (about); to discuss
2: the Analects (of Confucius)
item.A:
traditional: 論
1: lùn 2: lún
理论 (理論) lǐlùn theory 认识论 (認識論) rènshílún epistemological

jí
以及 yǐjí as well as; too; and

龙 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 龍
lóng
黑龙江 (黑龍江) Hēilóngjiāng Heilongjiang province (Heilungkiang) in northeast China, abbr. 黑, capital Harbin 哈尔滨; river forming the border between NE China and Russia (Amur)

Write the character:
leave; depart; separate; distinguish; classify; other; another; do not; must not; to pin
item.A:
traditional: 別
bié

item.Q:
Write the character: bǎ
(bǎwò de bǎ)
item.A:
to hold; to contain; to grasp; to take hold of; a handle; (classifier for objects with a handle); (particle marking the following noun as a direct object)
把握 bǎwò grasp; seize; hold; assurance; certainty

item.Q:
Write the character: bà
(bàzǐ de bà)
item.A:
handle
把子 bàzǐ handle

item.Q:
Write the character: bèi
(bèipò de bèi)
item.A:
by (indicates passive-voice sentences or clauses); to cover; to wear
被迫 bèipò be compelled; be forced

item.Q:
Write the character: gōng
(gōngsī de gōng)
item.A:
just; honorable (designation); public; common
公司 gōngsī (business) company; company; firm; corporation; incorporated

item.Q:
Write the character: lùn
(lǐlùn de lùn)
item.A:
traditional: 論
by the; per; discuss; theory; to talk (about); to discuss
理论 (理論) lǐlùn theory

item.Q:
Write the character: lún
(rènshílún de lún)
item.A:
traditional: 論
the Analects (of Confucius)
认识论 (認識論) rènshílún epistemological

item.A:
to reach; and
以及 yǐjí as well as; too; and

body; form; style; system

item.Q:
Write the character: tī
(kuàngtī de tī)
item.A:
traditional: 體
body
矿体 (礦體) kuàngtī orebody
yībǎshǒu working hand; member of a work team; participant
èrbǎshǒu deputy leader; the second-in-command

traditional: 個把
gèbǎ one or two; a couple of
bàzǐ handle
bǎshì person skilled in a trade; skill
bǎshǒu handle; grip; knob

traditional: 把關
bǎguān guard a pass; check on

traditional: 車把
chēbǎ handlebar

traditional: 被動
bèidòng passive
bèizi quilt
bèimiàn quilt
bùgōng unjust; unfair
gōngzhǔ princess
gōngshǐ minister; diplomat performing ambassadorial role in Qing times, before regular diplomatic relations
gōnggong husband's father; father-in-law
gōngfēn centimeter; gram
gōngzǐ childe
gōngjīa the public; the state; society; the public purse
gōngshì formula
gōngwén document

traditional: 公會
gōnghuì guild
gōngyǒu (adj) publicly owned
gōngzhèng just; fair; equitable
gōngmín citizen
gōngfǎ public law
gōngrán (do something) openly; undisguised; publicly
gōnglǐ (log.) axiom; axiomatic
gōngyòng public; for public use
gōnglù public road

gōngdao (adj) fair; equitable
gōngdào justice

traditional: 公開
gōngkāi public

traditional: 公開信
gōngkāixìn open letter

traditional: 國公
guógōng state company
wàigōng (informal) mother's father; maternal grandfather
dàgōng archduke

lǎogong (coll.) eunuch; see also 老公 lao3 gong1
lǎogōng (informal) husband

traditional: 不可知論
bùkězhīlùn agnosticism, the philosophical doctrine that some questions about the universe are in principle unanswerable

traditional: 不論
bùlùn whatever; no matter what (who, how etc); regardless of; not to discuss

traditional: 定論
dìnglùn final conclusion; accepted argument
dìnglún final conclusion

traditional: 方法論
fāngfǎlùn (n) methodology; Discourse on the Method (by Descartes)
fāngfǎlún methodology

traditional: 無論
wúlùn no matter what or how; regardless of whether...

traditional: 無論如何
wúlùnrúhé anyhow; anyway; whatever

traditional: 理論
lǐlùn theory

traditional: 相對論
xiāngduìlùn theory of relativity
xiāngduìlún relativism

traditional: 論文
lùnwén paper; treatise; thesis

traditional: 論點
lùndiǎn argument; line of reasoning; thesis; point (of discussion)

traditional: 資本論
Zīběnlùn Das Kapital
bùjí not as good as; inferior to; find it too late
yǐjí as well as; too; and

traditional: 來不及
láibují there's not enough time (to do sth.); it's too late (to do sth.)

traditional: 來得及
láidejí there's still time; be able to do sth. in time
lìsuǒnéngjí (saying) what you are capable of; within one's powers

traditional: 及時
jíshí in time; promptly; without delay; timely

traditional: 地龍
dìlóng lumbricus

traditional: 個別
gèbié individual; specific; respective; just one or two

traditional: 分別
fēnbié difference; distinction; apart; separate; separately; respectively

traditional: 別人
biérén other people; others; other person

traditional: 別名
biémíng another name

traditional: 別提
biétí to raise

traditional: 別有用心
biéyǒuyòngxīn to have an ulterior motive; a hidden agenda

traditional: 別的
biéde else; other

traditional: 別開生面
biékāishēngmiàn start sth new or original; break a new path; break fresh ground

traditional: 各別
gèbié (adj) in different ways; be different

traditional: 性別
xìngbié gender; sex; distinguishing between the sexes

traditional: 一體
yītǐ one body

traditional: 中心體
zhōngxīntī centerbody

traditional: 主體
zhǔtǐ main part; subject; agent

traditional: 人體
réntǐ human body

traditional: 個體
gètǐ individual

traditional: 全體
quántǐ all; entire

traditional: 多面體
duōmiàntī polyhedron
duōmiàntǐ polyhedron; polytope

traditional: 大體
dàtǐ in general; more or less; in rough terms; basically; on the whole

traditional: 大體上
dàtīshàng substantially
dàtǐshàng overall; in general terms

traditional: 天體
tiāntǐ celestial body; nude body

traditional: 實體
shítǐ entity; substance

traditional: 得體
détǐ appropriate to the occasion; fitting

traditional: 有機體
yǒujītǐ organism

traditional: 本體
běntǐ noumenon; thing-in-itself

traditional: 機體
jītǐ organism; human body

traditional: 正多面體
zhèngduōmiàntǐ regular polyhedron

traditional: 正方體
zhèngfāngtǐ a rectangular parallelepiped

traditional: 車體
chētī chassis

traditional: 長方體
chángfāngtǐ cuboid

traditional: 體力
tǐlì physical strength; physical power

traditional: 體會
tǐhuì know (through learning or by experience)

traditional: 體現
tǐxiàn to embody; to reflect; to give expression to; to be reflected in; exemplify

traditional: 體系
tǐxì system; setup

traditional: 體面
tǐmiàn dignity; face (as in "losing face"); honorable; creditable; pretty
